name: TabBar
desc: A Material Design primary tab bar.

fields.name: tabs
fields.desc: Typically a list of two or more [Tab] widgets.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: This widget's selection and animation state.

fields.name: isScrollable
fields.desc: Whether this tab bar can be scrolled horizontally.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space by which to inset the tab bar.

fields.name: indicatorColor
fields.desc: The color of the line that appears below the selected tab.

fields.name: indicatorWeight
fields.desc: The thickness of the line that appears below the selected tab.

fields.name: indicatorPadding
fields.desc: The padding for the indicator.

fields.name: indicator
fields.desc: Defines the appearance of the selected tab indicator.

fields.name: automaticIndicatorColorAdjustment
fields.desc: Whether this tab bar should automatically adjust the [indicatorColor].

fields.name: indicatorSize
fields.desc: Defines how the selected tab indicator's size is computed.

fields.name: dividerColor
fields.desc: The color of the divider.

fields.name: dividerHeight
fields.desc: The height of the divider.

fields.name: labelColor
fields.desc: The color of selected tab labels.

fields.name: unselectedLabelColor
fields.desc: The color of unselected tab labels.

fields.name: labelStyle
fields.desc: The text style of the selected tab labels.

fields.name: unselectedLabelStyle
fields.desc: The text style of the unselected tab labels.

fields.name: labelPadding
fields.desc: The padding added to each of the tab labels.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: Defines the ink response focus, hover, and splash colors.

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.scrollable.dragStartBehavior}

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.tabs.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the individual tab widgets.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: An optional callback that's called when the [TabBar] is tapped.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: An optional callback that's called when a [Tab]'s hover state in the [TabBar] changes.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: An optional callback that's called when a [Tab]'s focus state in the [TabBar] changes.

fields.name: physics
fields.desc: How the [TabBar]'s scroll view should respond to user input.

fields.name: splashFactory
fields.desc: Creates the tab bar's [InkWell] splash factory, which defines the appearance of "ink" splashes that occur in response to taps.

fields.name: splashBorderRadius
fields.desc: Defines the clipping radius of splashes that extend outside the bounds of the tab.

fields.name: tabAlignment
fields.desc: Specifies the horizontal alignment of the tabs within a [TabBar].

fields.name: textScaler
fields.desc: Specifies the text scaling behavior for the [Tab] label.

fields.name: indicatorAnimation
fields.desc: Specifies the animation behavior of the tab indicator.

nodes.name: Achieve No Ripple Effect by Setting Theme
desc: Set the ripple color in the Theme to transparent.
